snippet: Carrying an extraordinary name is remarkably widespread in Brazil. Just ask Wonarllevyston Garlan Marllon Branddon Bruno Paullynelly Mell Oliveira Pereira.
abstract: Practice of naming children has evolved into something resembling competitive sport in Brazil, leaving many people with long, complex and unusual names that often incorporate tributes to foreign celebrities or places.

byline.contributor: Taylor Barnes and Lis Horta Moriconi contributed reporting from Rio de Janeiro.

lead_paragraph: Carrying an extraordinary name is remarkably widespread in Brazil. Just ask Wonarllevyston Garlan Marllon Branddon Bruno Paullynelly Mell Oliveira Pereira.

headline.main: His Friends Know Him as Petroswickonicovick
headline.print_headline: His Friends Know Him as Petroswickonicovick
